version_description:
- Native iPad support + optimized experience for iPhone 6,6s,7 and iPhone Plus devices
- Now supporting both portrait and landscape orientations
- Enable multitask on iPad devices with full Split View support in iOS 9
- Bug fixes and stability improvements
- If you enjoy this update, please rate BookBuddy on the App Store!

What's New in Version 7.9.0
- Added full sync support using iCloud or Dropbox. (To enable, select Settings > Sync)

- Native iPad support + optimized experience for iPhone 6,6s,7 and iPhone Plus devices
- Now supporting both portrait and landscape orientations
- Enable multitask on iPad devices with full Split View support in iOS 9
- Bug fixes and stability improvements
- If you enjoy this update, please rate BookBuddy on the App Store!

What's New in Version 7.9.0
- Added full sync support using iCloud or Dropbox. (To enable, select Settings > Sync)

- Native iPad support + optimized experience for iPhone 6,6s,7 and iPhone Plus devices
- Now supporting both portrait and landscape orientations
- Enable multitask on iPad devices with full Split View support in iOS 9
- Bug fixes and stability improvements
- If you enjoy this update, please rate BookBuddy on the App Store!

What's New in Version 7.9.0
- Added full sync support using iCloud or Dropbox. (To enable, select Settings > Sync)

- Native iPad support + optimized experience for iPhone 6,6s,7 and iPhone Plus devices
- Now supporting both portrait and landscape orientations
- Enable multitask on iPad devices with full Split View support in iOS 9
- Bug fixes and stability improvements
- If you enjoy this update, please rate BookBuddy on the App Store!

What's New in Version 7.9.0
- Added full sync support using iCloud or Dropbox. (To enable, select Settings > Sync)

- Added 3D Touch support: Home Screen Quick Actions
- Added 3D Touch support: Peek and Pop (including Peek quick actions)
- Added Handoff support
- Allow quick access to recent navigation points via Spotlight Search (i.e. Wish List, Search, Favorites, Loaned Out, Being Read, Unread, etc.)
- Bug fixes and stability improvements
** If you enjoy this update, please rate BookBuddy on the App Store! **

- Added support for iOS 13:
- Beautiful appearance in dark mode!
- Support new swipe-to-dismiss gesture to quickly close dialogs
- Support new 3-fingers-drag gesture to quickly select multiple books
